subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick defeated Bjorn Phau, 6-2, 6-7 (4), 6-1, and will take on Dudi Sela in the men’s final at the China Open on Sunday in Beijing. Sela beat Rainer Schüttler, 6-3, 6-3. For the women, Jelena Jankovic will play Svetlana Kuznetsova in the title match after downing Vera Zvonareva, 6-4, 2-6, 6-4. Kuznetsova beat Zheng Jie, 7-6 (3), 7-5.
